1203960.name: Other Realms: Dwarves & more Dwarves
1203960.description:
Other Realms: Dwarves & more Dwarves is a dwarf based survival multiplayer game. Craft and build your kingdom piece by piece for your dwarves. Set foundations, forge devices and conquer your dwarven realm. Mine some stone, setup a base and secure it with turrets. Grab some mates and start building with your dwarves!
Key features:

  • Full 3D open world environment with a vast range of resources to mine from for your dwarf!
  • Integrated build system, allows you to place foundations and objects for your dwarves
  • Full tier building system, including building from diamonds and crystal
  • Monsters such as golems so your dwarves can smash them up!
  • A variety of dwarven technology recipes to build from
Did you enjoy playing Other Realms: Dwarves & more Dwarves? Join our discord channel and chat about anything dwarf related today!
